SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AShip
Represents a ship in the game, implementing the IShip interface.
Carrier
Represents a Carrier ship in the game, extending the AShip class.
Destroyer
Represents a Destroyer ship in the game, extending the AShip class.
Frigate
Represents a Frigate ship in the game, extending the AShip class.
Game
Representa el juego de Batalla Naval.
GameController
 
GameException
Custom exception class to handle game-specific errors.
GameMatrix
Representa una matriz de 10x10 utilizada para el juego de Batalla Naval.
GameStage
The GameStage class represents the main game window for the Battleship application.
IPlainTextFileHandler
Interface for handling plain text file operations.
ISerializableFileHandler
Interface for handling object serialization and deserialization.
IShip
Interface that defines the structure of a ship in the game.
Main
The main entry point for the MiniProject2 application.
PlainTextFileHandler
Implementation of the IPlainTextFileHandler interface for handling plain text files.
PositioningController
Controller class for managing the positioning phase of the Battleship game.
SerializableFileHandler
Implementation of the ISerializableFileHandler interface for handling serialization and deserialization of objects.
Ships
 
Submarine
Represents a Submarine ship in the game, which occupies 3 cells on the game board.
WelcomeController
Controller for the Welcome view of the application.
WelcomeStage
The WelcomeStage class represents the initial welcome window for the Battleship application.
